title: Ministry of Vengeance (1989 Action) When faith falters, vengeance rises.

sources.title: Ministry of Vengeance (1989 Action) When faith falters, vengeance rises.
sources.description:
They picked the wrong place and the wrong time to betray the wrong man. A Minister's family is killed by terrorists, and he takes revenge.

Director: Peter Maris
Writers: Randal Patrick, Mervyn Emeryys, Brian D. Jeffries

Main cast:
John Schneider – David Miller
Ned Beatty – Rev. Bloor
George Kennedy – Rev. Hughes
James Tolkan – Colonel Freeman
Yaphet Kotto – Mr. Whiteside
Apollonia Kotero – Zarah
Robert Miano – Ali Aboud
Meg Register – Gail Miller
Brodie Greer – Whiteside’s Liaison

Genres: Action, Thriller, War
Release date: November 3, 1989 (USA)
Filming location: California


00:00 Full movie with subtitles
09:27 David Miller’s family dies in a Beirut airport bombing. 
13:16 Rev. Miller confronts Agent Whiteside about terrorist Ali Aboud. 
26:50 Miller trains with Colonel Freeman’s mercenary squad. 
37:07 Miller infiltrates Lebanon using a missionary cover. 
64:03 Miller and Zara are captured by Aboud’s militia. 
85:01 Freeman betrays Miller, revealing CIA ties to Aboud. 
1:08:22 Miller executes Aboud, avenging his family. 
1:28:00 Miller resigns from the church, haunted by vengeance.

@CultCinemaClassics
